other.text: According to Japan’s transport ministry, there were 613 cases of train services suspended or delayed for at least 30 minutes resulting from collisions with deer and other wild animals in 2016-17.

definition.en_def: A particular situation or example; a container or box.
definition.example: She put her glasses in the case to protect them.
